sen.j: 松平 資尹（まつだいら すけただ）は、丹後国宮津藩の第2代藩主。
sen.e: Suketada MATSUDAIRA was the second lord of the Miyazu domain, Tango Province.
Suketada MATSUDAIRA was the second lord of the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: Suketada MATSUDAIRA was the second lord of the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province.
He was the fifth generation of Honjo Matsudaira family.
He was the fifth generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.
sen.cmt: the Honjo Matsudaira familyとしました。
sen.e: He was the fifth generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.

sen.j: 延享3年（1746年）3月21日、出羽国庄内藩の第5代藩主・酒井忠寄の七男として江戸で生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the seventh son of Tadayori SAKAI, the fifth lord of the Shonai domain, Dewa Province in Edo on May 11, 1746.
On May 11, 1746, he was born in Edo as the seventh son of Tadayori SAKAI, the fifth lord of the Shonai Domain, Dewa Province.
sen.cmt: on May 11, 1746、in Edoの位置を移動、domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: On May 11, 1746, he was born in Edo as the seventh son of Tadayori SAKAI, the fifth lord of the Shonai Domain, Dewa Province.

sen.j: 宝暦11年（1761年）8月19日、宮津藩の初代藩主・松平資昌の養子となり、11月27日の資昌の隠居により、家督を継いで第2代藩主となる。
sen.e: On September 17, 1761, he was adopted by Sukemasa MATSUDAIRA, the first lord of the Miyazu domain, succeeded to the family head, and became the second lord of domain due to Sukemasa's retirement on December 22.

On September 17, 1761, he was adopted by Sukemasa MATSUDAIRA, the first lord of the Miyazu Domain, succeeded to the family head, and became the second lord of the Domain due to Sukemasa's retirement on December 22.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更、the second lord of domain→the second lord of the Domainとしました。
sen.e: On September 17, 1761, he was adopted by Sukemasa MATSUDAIRA, the first lord of the Miyazu Domain, succeeded to the family head, and became the second lord of the Domain due to Sukemasa's retirement on December 22.

sen.j: 明和2年（1765年）7月23日、江戸で死去。
sen.e: He died in Edo on September 8, 1765.
He died in Edo on September 8, 1765.
He died in Edo on September 8, 1765.
He was 20 years old.
He was 20 years old.
He was 20 years old.

sen.j: 後を養子の松平資承が継いだ。
sen.e: His adopted child Suketsugu MATSUDAIRA succeeded to the post.
His adopted child Suketsugu MATSUDAIRA succeeded to the post.
His adopted child Suketsugu MATSUDAIRA succeeded to the post.
